summary:
Personal website
- Create a personal portfolio website using Hugo
- Deploy globally using Cloudflare
- Mobile-friendly with a responsive design

Web development for a 501(c)(3) nonprofit dedicated to providing free music education
- Add new pages such as collaboration promotions for local businesses, and a list of certified music teachers
- Created and integrated a webstore using Ecwid
- Edit video media for organization Youtube account and website
- Coordinate with different departments to keep website up to date
